title: Frank's slow cooker peanut chicken
ingredients: ['180g spicy salsa', '65g crunchy peanut butter', '180ml light coconut milk', '2 tablespoons fresh lime juice', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1 teaspoon sugar', '2 tablespoons freshly grated ginger', '900g skinless chicken thighs', '70g chopped peanuts, for serving', '2 tablespoons chopped coriander, for serving']
